divs: Sighting Detailsi was letting the puppy out front to go to the bathroom. i happened to look acrossed the street and caught something moving acrossed the roof of the neighbors house. i strated to look harder and saw what looked like 3 red lights in a straight line, blinking in order. after a few mins of watching them and the puppy was done, i went in to get my camera. i took a few shoots but they came out blurry. i tried with flash and with out just incase. i also tried to take a viedo. while i was taking these pictures, i also noticed that there was no sound. the object moved around the sky over the neighbors house, past there tree, then down the street. but started to work its way back over the neighbors house again. the lights never changed colors, just stayed red.
Object Flight Path: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
Summary: 3 lights on what looked like oval shaped UFO.
